scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff* *huff* *huff*... Yes! We won!!!
But I am beat... Phew...!
Shako...mon? That is you, isn’t it?

Huh? Miu... Oh, right. You wouldn’t know,
would you? Heheh.

It’s a pleasure to meet you again, Miu. My
new name is Mermaimon.
Mermaimon?

That’s right. I was able to take this form
because of how you changed.
How I...changed? What do you mean?

Haha, well, basically, how now you’re that
much closer to being an adult.
Me...an adult? Wait, for real?!

Yes, indeed. That’s why I’m here, you see.
Have more confidence!
If that’s true...then I’m super happy!

Anyway, I’m excited to keep being your
friend. Together forever, right?!
...Yeah!

...So, are you just gonna stand there
forever, Takuma?
Ulp! You noticed me, huh...

Sheesh, of course I did! Peeping at us from
that tree like that.
Ahaha, sorry! I didn’t mean to snoop, really.

Well... I don’t mind if it’s you, I guess.
Still, you better not say anything to Kaito!
Huh? Why not?

If he knew I fought against such a tough
enemy, I’d never hear the end of it...
